alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Meade; Pennington; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 9:53PM MDT until July 29 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL HAAKON...SOUTHWESTERN ZIEBACH...SOUTHEASTERN MEADE AND NORTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 953 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Plainview, or 35 miles south of Faith, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Plainview, Enning, Elm Springs, Creighton, Marcus, White Owl and Billsburg. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota near Mile Marker 102. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
